
import java.util.Scanner;
class Occurence
{
public static void main(String[] args)
{
Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
int n=sc.nextInt();
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
    int x=sc.nextInt();
 System.out.println(countFact(x,2));
 System.out.println(countFact(x,3));
 System.out.println(countFact(x,5));
}
}
public static int countFact(int n, int x)
{
 int c=0;
 while(n>=1)
  c+=(int)(n/=x);
 return c;
}
}
